metadata.Title: CVE-2021-32434 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
abcm2ps v8.14.11 was discovered to contain an out-of-bounds read in the function calculate_beam at draw.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-32434` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

abcm2ps - 7.8.9-1+deb9u1build0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: abcm2ps package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.8.9-1+deb9u1build0.18.04.1').
